short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This chrome extension invigilates the candidate's session during the duration of the test.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: GLIDER.ai Proctoring extension invigilates the candidate's session during the duration of the test. Glider seeks the candidate's explicit permission to install the plugin only if the hiring team mandates it as part of the proctoring setup in the assessment.
